description:
Compress and correct the ash supressions.

BUG=164676, 144990
TEST=local
Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=172443

messages.text: I have a green run locally with these in place.

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt
File tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt#newcode6379
tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt:6379: ...
nit: It's usually preferable to not have '...' right below an Uninitialized, 'cause then it matches various uninitializeds

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt#newcode6398
tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt:6398: ...
(You don't need '...' at the bottom of a stack, that's implicitly there)

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt
File tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt#newcode6379
tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt:6379: ...
On 2012/12/11 02:24:23, Nico wrote:
> nit: It's usually preferable to not have '...' right below an Uninitialized,
> 'cause then it matches various uninitializeds

Fixed.  There were two similar stacks, one with an extra "ClampTo8" that I was trying to catch together.

https://codereview.chromium.org/11515002/diff/5002/tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt#newcode6398
tools/valgrind/memcheck/suppressions.txt:6398: ...
On 2012/12/11 02:24:23, Nico wrote:
> (You don't need '...' at the bottom of a stack, that's implicitly there)

Done.

subject: Compress and correct the ash supressions.
